name: LowPolyDioramaJam2016 - Entry
description:
Low Poly Diorama Jam held by Arowx

Our diorama of our office at home.

Made in 3DS Max and Unity, our first 3D project. Very challenging! All models/textures made by us.

---

Special thanks

Aaron Hicks - for setting us down the 3D art path with a great crash-course and a few cozy hours of Dragon Ball Z. We owe you.
